author: DAMIAN CALHOUN
title: Football: Week 8 By the numbers
text:
Here is a look at the action from Week 8, according to the numbers: 
191 - Rushing yards gained by Katella's Francisco Pineda in Thursday's 42-14 victory over Anaheim. 
5 - Sacks recorded by the Katella defense, led by Leo Ruiz with two, in the victory. 
13 - Deficit El Modena faced at halftime (20-7) of Thursday's game against Canyon. The Vanguards scored two second-half touchdowns for the 21-20 victory. 
231 - Rushing yards gained by Kennedy's Anthony Johar to lead the way to a 31-13 victory over Western. 
273 - Total yards gained by Calvary Chapel's Braeden Stack (164 rushing, 109 receiving) to lead the Eagles to the 35-25 victory over Saddleback. 
301 - Passing yards for Calvary Chapel quarterback Sam Lak , in his first career start in the victory over Saddleback. 
6 - Touchdowns scored by Los Amigos running back Jose Olvera , including a 3-yard score in the third overtime to lead the Lobos to a 55-52 thriller over La Quinta. 
4 - Rushing touchdowns scored by Garden Grove's Jordan Antunez in the 76-0 victory over Bolsa Grande. 
3 - Rushing touchdowns scored by Orange Lutheran quarterback Lj Northington in Friday's 28-14 victory over Santa Margarita. 
311 - Passing yards for Mission Viejo quarterback Brock Johnson in the 48-20 victory over San Juan Hills. 
32 - Consecutive league winning streak for Mission Viejo with the victory over San Juan Hills. 
3 - Rushing touchdowns scored by Mission Viejo's Isaiah Miller in the victory. 
160 - Rushing yards gained by Mater Dei's Brandon LaMarche in the 42-10 victory over Servite. 
5 - Passing touchdowns for St. John Bosco's Quentin Davis in the 60-7 victory over JSerra. 
3 - Touchdowns scored by Edison's Turner Maza in the 28-13 victory over Huntington Beach. 
192 - Rushing yards gained by Tustin's Tyler Noble in the 35-15 victory over Pacifica. 
2 - Turnovers returned for touchdowns by Tustin ( Alema Pilimai's 76-yard interception return and Richard Lujan fumble return) in the victory. 
5 - Rushing touchdowns scored by Sonora's Jacob Fimbres in the 41-26 victory over Troy. 
7 - Touchdowns (five passing and two rushing) for San Clemente quarterback Jack Sears in the 59-0 victory over Laguna Hills. 
292 - Rushing yards gained by Segerstrom in the 35-0 victory over Santa Ana. 
277 - Passing yards for Trabuco Hills quarterback Cooper Uhl in the 48-14 victory over Capistrano Valley. 
42 - Points scored in the first half by Fountain Valley in Friday's 49-7 victory over Marina. 
3 - Touchdown receptions for Los Alamitos' Jacob Gasser in the 49-0 victory over Newport Harbor. 
7 - Touchdown passes for La Habra's Eric Barriere in the 62-13 victory over Fullerton. 
3 - First-half touchdowns for Tesoro's Devon Modster in the 68-7 victory over Dana Hills. 
192 - Rushing yards gained by Corona del Mar's Jaydin Moses in the 42-21 victory over University. 
4 - Passing touchdowns for Buena Park's Zach Taylor in the 42-13 victory over Sunny Hills. 
3 - Turnovers forced by Beckman in the fourth quarter to preserve an 18-13 victory over Irvine. 
351 - Passing yards for Rancho Alamitos quarterback Blake Culbert in the 49-14 victory over Santiago. Culbert had four passing touchdowns. More from Blog: OC Varsity
